__e: Fletcher controls the only road that leads to my father's mine... and I can't get any dynamite in because he won't allow anyone through.
I can't sell dynamite to a fool - or a half-grown boy.
This will buy enough dynamite to give my horse a rupture.
You're playing with dynamite... and it's going to blow up right in our faces.
But I was thinking you make the whole chair out of TNT, you'll go even higher.
How can you be driving a dynamite truck and not know where you're going?
